name: International Conference on Education & Integrating Technology
content: International Conference on Education & Integrating Technology (EDIT 2023) October 07 \~ 08, 2023, Virtual Conference https://edit2023.org/index Scope International Conference on Education & Integrating Technology (EDIT 2023) will act as a major forum for the presentation of innovative ideas, approaches, developments, and research projects in the areas of Education. It also aims to provide a platform for exchanging ideas in new emerging trends that needs more focus and exposure and will attempt to publish proposals that strengthen our goals. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Adult & Continuing Education • AI, Robotics and Human Computer Interaction in Education • Alternative Education • Alternative Education • Art & Design Education • Business Education • Business Education • Collaborative & Group Learning • Collaborative & Interactive Learning • Comparative Education • Counselor Education • Virtual and Remote Laboratories • Vocational Education & Training • Web, Social Networking, Blogs and Wikis • Web-Based Tools for Education • Youth Studies Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by September 09, 2023 . Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Cybernetics & Informatics (IJCI) (Confirmed). Selected papers from EDIT 2023, after further revisions, will be published in the special issues of the following journals. • International Journal on Integrating Technology in Education (IJITE) • International Journal of Education (IJE) Important Dates • Submission Deadline : September 09, 2023 • Authors Notification : October 02, 2023 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due : October 04, 2023 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : edit@edit2023.org (or) editconff@gmail.com Paper Submission URL: https://edit2023.org/submission/index.php
